sentences.en: 'Bring a torch, Dick,'said Silver , when my capture was thus assured.
sentences.cn: “ 拿个火把来, 迪克.”希尔弗等我被牢牢抓住后吩咐道.

sentences.en: 40 captured French soldiers
sentences.cn: 40名被俘虏的法国士兵

sentences.en: California is vying with other states to capture a piece of the growing communications market.
sentences.cn: 为了在日渐扩大的通讯市场分得一杯羹，加利福尼亚正在和其他州展开竞争。

sentences.en: Government troops have succeeded in capturing the rebel leader.
sentences.cn: 政府军已经成功抓获叛乱分子的头目。

sentences.en: He managed to evade capture because of the breakdown of a police computer.
sentences.cn: 因为警方一台电脑瘫痪，他成功地躲避了抓捕。

sentences.en: He was able to deal with his captivity by maintaining a high degree of anger about the unfairness of his capture.
sentences.cn: 他对自己不公正的被俘极为怨愤，正是这股怨愤使他得以熬过囚禁生涯。

sentences.en: His paintings capture the essence of France.
sentences.cn: 他的画描绘出法国的神韵。

sentences.en: His treachery led to the capture and imprisonment of his friend.
sentences.cn: 由于他的背叛,他的朋友被捕入狱.

sentences.en: Swanson persuaded Hubley to work undercover to capture the killer.
sentences.cn: 斯旺森说服赫布利去做卧底以便将凶手抓获。

sentences.en: the capture of Jerusalem in 1099
sentences.cn: 1099年攻占耶路撒冷

sentences.en: The Dutch fleet captured two English ships.
sentences.cn: 荷兰舰队虏获两艘英国船。

sentences.en: The easiest way to capture a fortress is from within.
sentences.cn: 堡垒是最容易从内部攻破的.

sentences.en: The marines went ashore as a spearhead this morning to capture key targets.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨，海军陆战队作为先头部队率先登陆以占领主要目标。

sentences.en: The photographers managed to capture Jane in an unguarded moment.
sentences.cn: 摄影师抓拍到了简不经意的瞬间。

sentences.en: The shooting happened while the man was trying to evade capture by the security forces.
sentences.cn: 那个男子试图逃脱安全部队的抓捕时,有人开了枪.

sentences.en: The tiger was finally captured two miles outside the village.
sentences.cn: 这只老虎终于在村外两英里的地方被捕获了。

sentences.en: The town was captured after a siege lasting ten days.
sentences.cn: 经过十天的围攻，该镇终于被攻陷。

sentences.en: The two soldiers somehow managed to avoid capture.
sentences.cn: 这两名士兵设法躲过了抓捕。

sentences.en: There was a small log raft there which they meant to capture.
sentences.cn: 那儿有只小木筏,他们打算据为己有.

sentences.en: These photographs capture the essence of working-class life at the turn of the century.
sentences.cn: 这些相片捕捉到了世纪之交工人阶级生活的神韵。

sentences.en: To capture his equity, Murphy must either sell or refinance.
sentences.cn: 要获得资产净值，墨菲必须出售或者重新融资。

sentences.en: We convert him, and we capture his inner mind ; we reshape him.
sentences.cn: 我们要改造他, 从思想上把他争取过来,让他 脱胎换骨.

sentences.en: With the capture of the escaped tiger, everyone felt relieved.
sentences.cn: 逃出来的老虎被捕获后, 大家都松了一口气.

trans.tran_en: when you catch someone in order to make them a prisoner
to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner

trans.tran_cn: 俘虏，占领，引起（注意、想象、兴趣），拍摄，表现，体现（感情、气氛）
trans.tran_en: to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner
to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner

trans.tran_cn: 俘获，捕获；夺得，占领；引起注意
trans.tran_en: to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner
to catch a person and keep them as a prisoner
